attributes.action: launch an immediate criminal investigation into MPs expenses claims to date.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Downing Street should be duty bound to launch a criminal investigation into, and hold public hearings on MPs expenses claims, rather than having the public settle for an empty apology and claiming an "honest mistake". Those found to have fraudulently claimed for mortgages and other "expenses" should be removed from office and charged with fraud by the Metropolitan Police, as a member of the public would be.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
